segments.text: Excuse me , is there any summer resort around the town ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As far as I know , the nearest one is next to the Willdon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It doesn't matter . I just want to have a relax and I don't care how far it is . Can you tell me how to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , take the greyhound bus . It will lead you directly there .
segments.speaker: S2
